attributes.action: make it illegal to have special offers on alcoholic drinks between the middle of November and the middle of January; every year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is very well-known that there are far more drink-drive accidents, causing injuries and even deaths, around Christmas time.  It therefore seems ridiculous, if not downright criminal, to encourage people to drink by having these offers.
